sentences.english: It is always this or that particular city.
sentences.chinese: 總是這種或那種排他的城市，城邦。

sentences.english: The 706 Factory House is a modern version of the ancient Roman city-state.
sentences.chinese: 諾大的七零六廠房，如同現代版的古羅馬城邦。

sentences.english: meant to live in a polis.
sentences.chinese: 就意味着要生活在一個城邦之中。

sentences.english: The institutions of a small city-state could not cope with an empire.
sentences.chinese: 小城邦的制度無法應付一個帝國。

sentences.english: In other words, no Platonic cities in speech.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說談話中不帶柏拉圖式的城邦論點。

sentences.english: The defeat of the Persians at Mycale roused the Greek cities of Asia.
sentences.chinese: 波斯人在米卡里的戰敗喚醒了亞洲的希臘城邦。

sentences.english: The city of Primordium was founded before any of the great cities of myth or history.
sentences.chinese: 普利摩頓比神話或歷史上任何一個偉大城邦都要古老。

sentences.english: Since it was born, Rome faced to the threaten by its neighbor Achaean .
sentences.chinese: 自羅馬誕生以來，它就面臨着鄰居希臘諸城邦的威脅。

sentences.english: He traveled to all the Free Cities, and Westeros as well.
sentences.chinese: 他遊歷過所有的自由城邦和維斯特洛伊大陸。

sentences.english: The contradiction between the city eventually led to the outbreak of the Peloponnesian War.
sentences.chinese: 城邦之間的矛盾終於導致伯羅奔尼撒戰爭爆發。

sentences.english: Junon Polis is the capital of the Akram Kingdom .
sentences.chinese: 天后城邦就是資本的阿克蘭英國。

sentences.english: Junon Polis also boasts the largest harbor on the planet.
sentences.chinese: 天后城邦也擁有最大的港口對這個星球。

sentences.english: With the advent of agriculture, tribes gave way to city-states.
sentences.chinese: 隨着農業的出現，城邦取代了部落。

sentences.english: Polis fragmented, non- unified monarchy, the war between the city-state.
sentences.chinese: 城邦各自爲政，無統一君主，城邦之間戰爭不斷。

sentences.english: Polis fragmented, non- unified monarchy, the war between the city-state.
sentences.chinese: 城邦各自爲政，無統一君主，城邦之間戰爭不斷。

sentences.english: The origin of city-states is disputable.
sentences.chinese: 古代城邦的起源是有爭議的。

definition: Thebes, place name in ancient Egypt/Thebes, ancient Greek city state
